Text:
Why do people like EeePC so much? I mean there are so many other choices like these ones here:

http://paulsdigitalworld.blogspot.com/2008/02/inventory-of-great-portable-pcs.html
@Johnnash: 1. Stop with the blogspam. 2. Because people don't want to pay $1299.

Anyone comparing eee to a laptop is out of his mind and should be ignored. The eee is great value for it's money and fills the gap between pocketpc and laptop. At last. And thats why. And eeeXubuntu upgrades the fine eee to a valuable tool for the lowbudget roadwarrior.
Didn't work on my Asus EEE pc 900. -.-
